summary: A lonely security guard finds more than he expected when he buys a rooster in order to get into the cockfighting game.
cast: Allan Cascante|Sylvia Sossa|Marvin Acosta|Erlan Vásquez|David Ríos|Omar Mora|Omar Mora|Marbely Zamora|Jonathan Marin|Manuel Ramírez|René Montenegro|Orlando Mora|Flora Charpentier|Harold Calderon Vargas|Andres Gamboa|Erick Córdoba|Amadeo Hidalgo
title: Por las plumas
